lead_paragraph: The documents show investigators never proposed that Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl be tried on the most serious charge he faces: endangering troops sent to search for him.

headline.print_headline: Documents Show Army Initially Pursued Softer Course on Bergdahl
headline.main: New Documents Reveal Army Once Pursued Softer Approach on Bergdahl

snippet: The documents show investigators never proposed that Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl be tried on the most serious charge he faces: endangering troops sent to search for him.
abstract: Documents reveal Army investigators initially tasked with examining Sgt Bow Bergdahl's desertion in Afghanistan recommended milder punishment than Bergdahl faces; Bergdahl, who was captured by Taliban, has been charged with endangering troops sent to rescue him; discrepancy has led some to question whether tougher approach reflects improper influence or political considerations.
